description: The care gap type category IDs detailing what was discusssed during the outreach.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the communication record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: REFERENCE_HM_CARE_GAP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Care Gap Type referenced by this Communication Tracking record. This value is used to track what the topics the patient was called about.


May contain organization-specific values: No
